title: Incident 3
scenario: Clients call in and say the website is slow with sporadic timeouts

title: Incident 6
scenario: DDoS Attack on primary webserver cluster

title: Incident 7
scenario: SFTP uploads to a fail. Clients are enraged, you've gotten four calls from support.

title: Incident 8
scenario: From mobile app, All posting to Facebook stops working.

title: Incident 9
scenario: All drives for the database cluster suddenly fill to 100%

title: Incident 10
scenario: An exploit is discovered on your service, leaking PI and sensitive data. You've learned this from a late night email from legal and security.
